alert.note: Alert for Hayes (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 27 at 9:42AM CDT until May 27 at 10:35PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Nebraska... Stinking Water Creek at Palisade 2NW affecting Hayes County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is currently forecast. * WHERE...Stinking Water Creek at Palisade 2NW. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Flood Stage. Agricultural land along the creek floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 9.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to near 10.1 feet Saturday afternoon, then gradually fall on Sunday. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Stinking Water Creek Palisade 2NW 10.0 9.8 Sat 8 am CDT 8.5 5.9 5.2 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
